name: MOHAMMAD MAHFIZUR
bio: [('Beginning', 'He took up the sport in 2000 in Pabna, Bangladesh. (Athlete, 23 Jul 2012)'), ('Reason', 'His father encouraged him to take up the sport. (thanyapura.com, 21 Jun 2017)'), ('Debut', '2009 for Bangladesh (Athlete, 23 Jul 2012)'), ('Coach', 'Miguel Angel Lopez Alvarado (thanyapura.com, 21 Jun 2017; fina.org, 30 Mar 2017)'), ('Ambition', 'To compete at the 2020 Olympic Games in Tokyo. (thanyapura.com, 21 Jun 2017)'), ('Awards', "He was Bangladesh's flag bearer at the opening ceremony of the 2012 Olympic Games in London. (thedailystar.net, 13 Jul 2012)"), ('Additional Information', 'GeneralSCHOLARSHIPHe was one of 36 swimmers from across the world to receive an International Swimming Federation [FINA] Scholarship in 2017, which was designed to help the athletes to qualify and participate at the 2017 World Championships in Budapest, Hungary. The scholarship also presented the athletes with the option to train at FINA-approved training centres in Thailand, the United States of America and Senegal. (thanyapura.com, 21 Jun 2017; fina.org, 01 Mar 2017)OCCUPATIONHe works as a swimming coach for the Bangladesh Navy. (thanyapura.com, 21 Jun 2017) '), ('Hero', 'Brazilian swimmer Cesar Cielo, US swimmer Michael Phelps. (Athlete, 23 Jul 2012)'), ('Nickname', 'Sagor (Facebook profile, 02 Aug 2018)'), ('Injuries', 'In June 2016 he was troubled by a shoulder injury. name: SHERIN
bio: [('Reason', '"From childhood I was attracted to different sorts of games and I wanted to do something uncommon, which was really rare to the other girls of my neighbourhood. Along with that, there was one person whose activities inspired me a lot to become a wrestler, she was Saori Yoshida [Japanese Olympian]. I watched her performance on TV and became her fan. In the bottom of my heart I always felt a dream to be a wrestler like her as she brought pride to her country." (dailyasianage.com, 20 Mar 2018)'), ('Additional Information', 'GeneralDEVELOPING WRESTLINGShe is passionate about developing wrestling in Bangladesh. "My first plan is to be a female wrestling mentor and to form an academy for female wrestling. From there, deprived girls and women would find every kind of support to continue their wrestling practice and study too. l would like to give them opportunities to utilise their talents and to bring some pride to the nation." (dailyasianage.com, 20 Mar 2018) '), ('Hero', 'Japanese wrestler Saori Yoshida. (dailyasianage.com, 20 Mar 2018)'), ('Languages', 'Bengali'), ('Highlights', 'WRESTLING FREESTYLERankEventYearLocationSouth Asian Games2Freestyle 69 kg2016Guwahati, INDCommonwealth Games4Freestyle 68 kg2018Gold Coast, QLD, AUSAsian Indoor and Martial Arts Games9Freestyle 69 kg2017Ashgabat, TKMWUSHURankEventYearLocationAsian Games9Sanda -60kg2014Incheon, KOR')]
